title: Anyone else stuck ingame 500 ping and can't move?
body:
Anyone else stuck ingame 500 ping and can't move?

My network is fine and all, but the game just started and I dc'd.

replies.body: There was trouble with Telstra the other day (like two days ago). It could be a problem with ISP servers that Riot is using. If you can play any other online game and look through videos with no problem then it could be Riot servers with their ISPs.
notice when i play gnar and i go mega gnar i always just freeze on the spot and get 250-500 ping but every like 15-20 seconds i get like high ping when my network is fine
